title: karuNai varumO
sahitya:
karuNai varumO enrEnginEn shivakAma sundari shiridEnum unNdan


anupallavi

  varuNan pozhiyum mazhaimukham nOkki vADum sAtaka paravaiyAnEn unran


caraNam    maNNil viLaiyADum nAL mudal undan malaradi maranNdaduNDO
viNNOr munivar pugazh pOlagham vaLar en kuladeivamE manamiranNgi enrunadu
